name: @nnwnRL
description:
* This game is a pre-alpha build and is in no way feature complete. *

Welcome to the land of Annwn, a land full of opportunity and rewards. A place where dreams can come true but your worse nightmares might lurk around the next corner. Adventure awaits the brave, as you explore the wonders of this mystical place.

@nnwnRL is a single-player roguelike available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

Controls

Up, Down, Right, Left Arrows - Movement
i - Inventory
g - Pick up item
d - Drop item
< - Go up staircase
Esc - Main menu

Ranged weapons - select in inventory and click target
